paper_abstract: This paper presents a new approach for the simultaneous synthesis and optimization of heat integrated water networks. A new superstructure for heat exchanger network (HEN) synthesis is proposed. The procedure is based on mixed integer non-linear mathematical programming (MINLP). Four relevant examples are presented to illustrate various aspects of the proposed approach. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Synthesis of non-isothermal heat integrated water networks in chemical processes
